title: Blue Family
credit_line: Gift of Dr. and Mrs. Raymond W. Goldblum in memory of Dr. Albert Goldblum
provenance_text:
Carl-Henning Pedersen [1913-2007], Copenhagen, Denmark; Lefebre Gallery, New York, NY, until January 1972 [1]; Dr. and Mrs. Raymond W. Goldblum, Pittsburgh, PA, January 1972 until October 11, 1979; their gift to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, October 1979.

Notes:
[1]. Lefebre Gallery provenance is from appraisal by Edward Lucien, dated August 10, 1979 (see curatorial file.)
